amendment.description: An amendment numbered 16 printed in Part B of House Report 118-559 to prohibit funds for the Special Representative for Ukraine's Economic Recovery.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 109 - 303 (Roll no. 305).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 109 - 303 (Roll no. 305).
